Welcome to bonapity's documentation!
====================================

``bonAPIty`` is the simplest python (3.7) package allowing you to use your code throught a API (REST) with only 3 lines of code !

You are the 👨‍🍳, just do what you do the best: cook code ! Do not lose your time to 💁, we do it for you 🤓.

All you have to do is install it with ``pip3`` and enjoy !

.. code:: bash

    pip3 install bonapity


How did we it ? Take a look to our `git <https://github.com/VieVie31/bonapity>`_.
